title: Give the ability to buy skins in champ select again
body: It was always nice to have the ability to purchase skins in champ select but now that it is gone it kinda sucks when you want to buy a new skin

replies.body: I feel the same way. The Store team is working hard on giving us more and better ways to buy LoL content though.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=Bgz30FmR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T20:19:01.661+0000)
>
> I feel the same way. The Store team is working hard on giving us more and better ways to buy LoL content though.

On that note, I feel like there should be a way to buy champions in champ select. Smite offers a great way of doing it of having all of your unlocked champions sorted alphabetically at the top, and all the locked ones at the bottom. I can understand if it's not available for ranked for obvious purposes, but it'd be useful if you have the urge to try a champion but you don't own them yet.

Such a feature would only be able to be available in blind pick (maybe ARAM though how would that work), making it a pretty low use feature.

Not sure it would work.
